body.name: ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod, Extendable 3 in 1 Aluminum Bluetooth Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote and Tripod Stand for iPhone 13/13 Pro/12/11/11 Pro/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8/7, Samsung Smartphones, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 6 mins
features: ⭐ [Integrated Innovative Design] - The ATUMTEK Selfie Stick and tripod stand are integrated, combined with a premium aluminum extendable stick, making the selfie stick exceptionally stable. The extendable pole is constructed with aviation-grade aluminum alloy and undergoes surface anodic oxidation for sturdiness and durability.

⭐ [Adjustable Angle & Rotatable Phone Holder] - The ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick features a 270-degree rotatable phone holder design that supports both horizontal and vertical clamping of mobile phones. The 180-degree rotation allows you to select the perfect angle for your photos. The phone holder accommodates devices with widths up to 3.42 inches.

⭐ [Detachable Bluetooth Remote & Impressive Battery Life] - The Bluetooth control distance extends up to 33ft, enabling you to take photos on your own or capture group shots by removing the remote controller. The built-in 50mAh rechargeable and recyclable Lithium battery lets you capture up to 15,000 photos on a full charge via the Micro USB charging port (5V/110mAh). The Bluetooth remote is compatible with IOS 7.0, Android 5.0, and above devices.

⭐ [Super Lightweight & Convenient to Carry] - Thanks to the discreet retractable design, the folded size is only 7.7 inches, while it can extend up to a maximum of 31.3 inches. You can easily stow it in pockets or small bags. Whenever you want to capture a beautiful moment, it's right there.

⭐ [Simple to Use & Universally Compatible] - Establish a quick Bluetooth connection with your phone and effortlessly use this handheld selfie stick by pressing the shutter control button. Utilize it for close self-photography or extend it for capturing wider scenery. Moreover, it can serve as a desktop phone holder for activities like live internet broadcasts and binge-watching TV shows. With its highly adjustable view height, it significantly reduces neck and shoulder discomfort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ATUMTEK Selfie Stick adopts an integrated design, with the body made of aeronautical-grade aluminum and a surface processed with anodic technique. With the most portable, fashionable, and robust wireless Bluetooth selfie stick on the market, let's say goodbye to fragile and odorous plastic ones.

Previous page With a 270° horizontal rotation of the phone holder, you can choose portrait or landscape mode. Provided with a 180° vertical rotation, you can choose the best angle when you take photos. The folded length is just 19.5cm with a weight of only 172g, making it easy and convenient to carry. Next page 1 270° Horizontal Rotation 2 180° Vertically Tilt 3 Lightweight and Portable

Previous page Next page The ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod, designed with considerate details to enhance your photography experience. This versatile device features a stable tripod stand for steady shots, while the silicone pads at the bottom of the tripod legs provide added stability on any surface.

Previous page Next page The built-in rechargeable Bluetooth remote ensures seamless control over your phone's camera, allowing you to capture moments effortlessly. Crafted with durable aluminum, the extended pole offers reliable support, while the secure grip of the phone holder keeps your device firmly in place.
With the ATUMTEK Selfie Stick Tripod, you can confidently take photos and videos from any angle, making it a must-have accessory for every adventure and occasion.

Material Aluminium Alloy Stretchable Length 31.3 inches Fold Length 7.7 inches Weight 172g Device Width 2.16 - 3.42 inches Bluetooth Version 4.0 Bluetooth Compatibility iOS 7.0, Android 5.0 and above Battery Type Lithium battery Battery Capacity 50mAh Photo Capture 20,000+ Maximum Load 15KG

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Selfie Stick at a good price!
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty dissent selfie stick. It holds up firmly against the weight of my Galaxy 21S+ with no issues. It is light enough to not exhaust the hand, but hardy enough to not crumble under the weight of the phone. On several occasions, I've used it to take photos and videos for hours at a time and surprised videographers using heavy tripods. I like the fact that it can be used as a stand, so you can use the timer on the phone camera and be part of a group photo. The stick is also comfortable to carry by hand. I've held it in my hands on international flights and never had any issues with customs.The only thing to watch is the remote, particularly when dislodged from the stick. It is very small and light, and chances are that you could lose it easily. Other than that, if you aren't careless and misplace the remote, you will have a stick to enjoy for a long time. In fact, I've found the remote to hold the charge longer than the phone while I am actively taking pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod, Extendable 3 in 1 Aluminum Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote is conveniently small, so you can carry it along easily while traveling, and it's made of aluminum, so it's sturdy as well. The built-in tripod us easy to deploy and use, and makes the unit that much more usable. A great find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and handy…
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t get as tall as you might want.When I close it, I feel afraid for finger pinching, but it hasn’t happened yet.Button clicker works great with my phone. Set it up once in Bluetooth settings and it connects seamlessly automatically.Took it on vacation and am now using it afterwards. It’s durable and sleek.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This selfie stick feels super high-quality and was very versatile. I took it on vacation and usually don't use selfie sticks but it helped us take great family photos that I'll cherish forever. I can't say enough about the feel of it - you'd probably expect it to cost twice as much. The bluetooth remote also worked very well and is cleverly integrated/stored on the device. This is THE selfie-stick to commit to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight aluminum with quality craftsmanship.
reviews.reviewText: I recently underwent cataract surgery on both eyes, and my new lenses both have a focal range between 8 and 18 inches, so I an unable to watch TV until my eyes are fully healed and I can get new prescription glasses for distance, which is about six weeks out. I purchased this item so that I can watch videos on my smart phone, and it is ideal for this purpose. It comes with a small "Bluetooth" switch, that when paired with a smartphone, will allow you to remotely activate the shutter when using the stick to take selfies. A couple of things to know about this unit: It has three legs built into the base to allow it to be used as a tripod, and the way to extend those feet is to telescope the stick to it's maximum length. It is important to note that if you try to pull the tripod legs out of the base without extending the telescoping sections all the way first, the folding tripod leg mechamisms can be damaged. The jaws on the end of the stick have a very strong sping to clamp the phone securely. There is no chance that the phone can come loose while attached to the stick, but one downside is that the spring is so strong it can be difficult to remove the phone without putting excessive force on the tiny tilt. The telescoping sections are very tight/snug to each other too, but that ensures that once the desired extension length is set, the distance placement won't slip or vary. Overall, a great deal of thought went into the engineering of this fine tool, and the quality of the fabrication craftsmanship is excellent, but in normal use, whilst pulling on the sections or clamp springs, one must constantly be aware that the tiny hinge at the tip is somewhat fragile and should not be overly twisted or torqued. But if you are careful, and treat it like a wristwatch or fishing pole, this can be a useful instrument for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and function
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised, sleek, easy set-up, has all the features I want for travel and self-photos, good delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I already have two selfie sticks, both a couple years old. The newer features on more recent models such as this one make the old sticks obsolete.For example, my old selfie sticks did not have bluetooth remote control built in, requiring a third party little remote. The watch battery in this was shot and a replacement battery is more than $5. By contract, this unit has bluetooth remote built in and it is USB RECHARGEABLE. No more battery replacements. Worth the cost right there.In addition, the bluetooth remote is incorporated into the handle so I no longer have to fumble with both the selfie stick and a remote while trying to get the perfect selfie. Again, worth the cost right there.The BT remote also can be removed from the handle so that if instead you set this selfie stick up as a tripod and step away from it, you can still hold the remote in your hand.Perhaps best of all, this unit collapses into a very tight and tidy package that can fit in a pocket or a small purse, so it can always be with you and at the ready while not being bulky and inconvenient to keep on hand.Fit and finish are terrific, it feels like a high quality aluminum. Everything feels a little too stiff and resistive when expanding and contracting, to the point I am afraid I am pulling or pushing so hard I might break something, but I imagine that will loosen up a bit with use. If it loosens up a little it will be great and if it loosens up too much it may become a bit sloppy and clumsy. It is built and designed so well, however, that I am optimistic they designed it well and it will loosen it's joints just a bit with time and use.Excellent product, even more so given the very reasonable price.
El artículo llegó mucho antes de lo que marcaba la app, totalmente nuevo y con todas las piezas. Recomiendo al vendedor 100%!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the best selfie stick our family has owned.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife for her Christmas present years ago. The product has held up really well over the years. It has always connected first try and without issues. We love the tripod option. For our family of four, it allows up to take family photos without bothering anyone else to take pictures over and over until we're happy with them. Lastly it's small enough and light enough for my wife to sneak it into her purse without me noticing so she can use it wherever we're at.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super qualité et agréable à utiliser
reviews.reviewText: La recharge dure très longtemps simple a configurer et agréable a utiliser et léger en main

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made product for the price. Easy to set up remote function and a good looking product (to look at it's bit like a light sabre - lol!)

reviews.reviewTitle: Después de tres años, siguen funcionando perfectamente y sin mostrar marcas de uso
reviews.reviewText: ¡Este palo selfie es genial! Tiene materiales de calidad y acabados excelentes. La conexión con el teléfono es rápida. Es compacto, ligero y cuenta con un práctico mando a distancia integrado, ideal para no usar el temporizador. Además, es resistente y estable, tanto como palo selfie como trípode. La extensión podría ser un pelín más larga. Su tamaño lo hace perfecto para guardar en cualquier bolso. Cumple todas las expectativas y es ideal para viajes por su tamaño. Regalé dos y quedaron encantados. Después de tres años, siguen funcionando perfectamente y sin mostrar marcas de uso.
